description:
Getting a taxi is never going to be the same. 

For the first time, you get to choose your taxi driver based on your specific needs, rather than have someone randomly assigned to you. 

As seen on the WSJ and TechCrunch, Taxibeat enables you to hail a taxi wherever you are, whenever you want, at no extra cost. Tap for the map, pick your driver, hop in and get where you're going. Instead of flagging down a stranger, you get a trusted taxi driver rated by other Taxibeat users. Get a taxi in two taps: One for the map and the other for the driver you want: choose the nearest cab, the nicest vehicle or the most recommended driver. 

Don't forget to rate your ride! By rating your ride, you help fellow Taxibeaters find the best drivers in the city and reward drivers for their great service. You can always expect Taxibeat drivers to walk the extra mile for their passengers, as they know this is a one-way street to a 5* rating. 

Featured on TechCrunch: http://techcrunch.com/2012/12/03/taxibeat-leweb/

How it works: 
* Let the app locate you and tap “Search for a taxi” 
* Check the list that pops up and choose your driver 
* Hail your driver by a tap on your smartphone 
* Watch him approach the pick-up point 
* Enjoy the ride!
* Rate your experience with Taxibeat. 

Taxibeat is available in Greece, Brazil, Mexico and Peru.

Find us on Facebook: 
www.facebook.com/Taxibeat 

Follow us on Twitter 
www.twitter.com/taxibeat 

We are always eager to listen to your feedback. Unfortunately, we can't respond to customer support requests through the App Store; if you need help/have a suggestion for us, please drop us a line athelp@taxibeat.com 

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes:
This version is about bug fixing and minor tweaks that will upgrade your experience with Taxibeat. 

Enjoy your rides!
